longBusinessSummary: Ethos Limited operates a chain of luxury watch boutiques in India. The company offers luxury and premium watch; pre-owned watch; jewellery and jewellery box; watch strap and winder; clock; collector box; and luxury luggage. It also provides product repair and services, including movement overhauling, battery replacement, ultrasonic cleaning, polishing, performance tests, and parts and strap replacement. In addition, the company sells its products online. It sells its products under the Omega, Baume & Mercier, Rado, Breitling, Bvlgari, Carl F. Bucherer, Girard-Perregaux, HUBLOT, IWC Schaffhausen, Jacob & Co, Jaeger-LeCoultre, LAURENT FERRIER Genève, LONGINES, Louis Moinet, Maurice Lacroix, H. Moser & Cie, NOMOS Glashütte, ORIS, PANERAI, Parmigiani Fleurier, BOVET, SPEAKE-MARIN, TagHeuer, TRILOBE, ZENITH, NORQAIN, and URWERK brands. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India.
